Uses of Interface
ml.alternet.security.auth.CryptFormatter

  • Packages that use CryptFormatter 
    Package Description
    ml.alternet.security.auth  
    ml.alternet.security.auth.formatters
    Common built-in crypt formatters used to breakdown a crypt in its parts or format parts of a crypt in its string representation.

    • Uses of CryptFormatter in ml.alternet.security.auth

      Methods in ml.alternet.security.auth that return CryptFormatter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CryptFormatter<? extends CryptParts> Hasher.HasherBuilder.getFormatter() 
      <T> CryptFormatter<? extends CryptParts> Hasher.Configuration.getFormatter()
      The formatter used to breakdown a cypt in parts, or to format parts in a crypt.
      Methods in ml.alternet.security.auth with parameters of type CryptFormatter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hasher.Builder Hasher.Builder.setFormatter(CryptFormatter<? extends CryptParts> cryptFormatter)
      Set the crypt formatter
      Hasher.Builder Hasher.HasherBuilder.setFormatter(CryptFormatter<? extends CryptParts> formatter) 

    • Uses of CryptFormatter in ml.alternet.security.auth.formatters

      Classes in ml.alternet.security.auth.formatters that implement CryptFormatter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Argon2CryptFormatter
      The Argon2 hash format is defined by the argon2 reference implementation.
      class  BCryptFormatter
      The most popular formatter for BCrypt is the Modular Crypt Format.
      class  ColonCryptFormatter
      The colon crypt formatter : "PBKDF2:999:0314E17362D0D966C8F999A66045210DBE7EA897F024E07F:3AE344F7AB5AA17308A49FDAD997105340DD6E348FDF5623" Although it is based on WorkFactorSaltedParts, the work factor may be omitted.
      class  CurlyBracesCryptFormatter
      Crypt formatter for {scheme}hash and {scheme.encoding}hash.
      class  CurlyBracesCryptFormatterWrapper<T extends CryptParts>
      A wrapper around another formatter, for handling composed crypts such as {CRYPT}$1$gwvn5BO0$3dyk8j.UTcsNUPrLMsU6/0
      class  IterativeSaltedCurlyBracesCryptFormatter
      An iterative salted formatter.
      class  MD5ModularCryptFormatter
      The most popular formatter for this hasher is the Modular Crypt Format.
      class  PBKDF2ModularCryptFormatter
      One popular formatter for PBKFD2 family is the Modular Crypt Format.
      class  PlainTextCryptFormatter
      Convert string to bytes and vice-versa with the supplied bytes encoder or by default with the supplied charset.
      class  SaltedCurlyBracesCryptFormatter
      Salted crypt formatter for {scheme}hash and {scheme.encoding}hash.
      class  SaltedModularCryptFormatter
      Salted Modular Crypt Formatter
      class  SaltlessModularCryptFormatter
      Used by the NT-HASH algorithm (Microsoft Windows NT and successors) that looks like a salted crypt, but without a salt field.
      class  SHA2ModularCryptFormatter
      SHA2 crypt formatter : $5$rounds=12345$q3hvJE5mn5jKRsW.
      class  UnixCryptFormatter
      The Unix Crypt formatter : 2 characters salt followed by the hash, each character encoded in the h64 encoder value space.
      class  UnixMD5CryptFormatter
      Trivial formatter for a crypt made of just a hash field.
      Constructors in ml.alternet.security.auth.formatters with parameters of type CryptFormatter 
      Constructor and Description
      CurlyBracesCryptFormatterWrapper(CryptFormatter<T> cf, String scheme, CryptFormat cryptFormat)
      Create a crypt formatter wrapper
